name: Escape (itch) (NarrowGame)
description:
Escape Game Created By Narrow Game.

This is a short horror game, with a few objectives.

In this game, the main character (which you playing with) has been kidnaped by a psychopath during his camping. You have to escape from him.

This game is made by Unity 3D Game engine, Blender 3D is used for making the models in this game.

If you notice any bugs, or problems in this game, please don't hesitate to tell me in the comments section, thank you.

The Keyboard Controls:

In this game, the keyboard controls are the default ones :

  • Move with W, A, S, D
  • Jump with Spacebar
  • Toggle flashlight using the "F" key or the right mouse button
  • Crouch with "C"
  • Pause with the Escape button

Note: this game is made by an old version of Unity engine, which unfortunately has many limitations, because of my low pc specifications. So if you want to support me to create better games, here's the link of the donation: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/narrowgame
